page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: When I wake up in the morning I have my breakfast which is cereals.Then I get washed and clean my teeth.Once I have done this I get dressed into my school uniform.Once I am ready for school I sit down and watch television for a while till it's time to go to school.When I arrive at school I go and talk to my friends till the bell is rung which means you have to go to your classes.In class we learn things like how to do Maths and English and things like that properly.After school I go to my Nana's for my tea then I go home.At home I play out with my friends and build camps. I go in the house about nine o clock. When I go in I get ready for bed then I watch television till it's time to go to bed which is about ten oclock at night. by.Leanne Gaythwaite aged 11
